title: IProfileGroupFolder.ProfileType
description: Gets the profile type for this member profile group.
returns: Weldment profile type as defined in a weldment profile
remarks:
This property:
is valid only if a
IProfileGroupFolder::ProfileStandard
is set.
may be overridden by
IStructureSystemMemberProfile::ProfileType
for individual members.
Specify this property using strings found in:
SOLIDWORKS-supplied weldment profile (*.
sldlfp
) from
install_dir
\
lang
\
lang_name
\
weldment profiles
-
or -
custom weldment profile (*.
sldlfp
); see the SOLIDWORKS Help for details about custom weldment profiles
